titles.title: A bill to amend the Foreign Trade Zones Act to allow foreign trade zones to be established where a regional commission involving more than 1 State will coordinate zone activities.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6272-6273)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to authorize a regional commission to establish a foreign-trade zone in two or more States if certain requirements are met.
